Class Cooler

java.lang.Object
cartago.Artifact

artifact.environment.roomartifact.Cooler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SwitchableArtifact
public class Cooler
extends AbstractActuatorInRoomArtifact
implements SwitchableArtifact
CArtAgO artifact that is responsible for the communication with the hvac system of the operating block respect to the cooling part.
